name: Bionicle Heroes: DOOM
storyline: The demon invasion of the earth did not work out so well, so now the demons are trying Mata Nui in the world of Bionicle. You play as the Maskless Toa. You have the ability to summon guns and powers based on what mask you wear. The Toa Mata have all lost their masks so you must find them and use them to fight back the invasion.
summary: This is a weapon and playerclass mod for GZdoom. This mod adds 8 new weapons. Weapon sprites were made by rendering 3d models taken from the original game.
